description:
The abstraction of water shall only take place when the dissolved oxygen level in the <<river/watercourse name>> immediately upstream of the authorised point of abstraction, point ‘A’ as specified in condition <<xx>> above, is equal to or greater than <<xx Milligrams per litre>> and the abstraction shall not cause the flow immediately downstream of the said point to fall below that rate.
The licence holder shall inform the Agency in writing within 5 days if the dissolved oxygen level falls below <<xx Milligrams per litre>>.
